product_name: Sugoi Firewall 220 Zip Jacket - Women's - 2010 Closeout
long_description: The Sugoi Firewall 220 Zip jacket is a sound choice for cold-weather rides. Firewall 220 fabric provides the ultimate protection for winter aerobic activities, balancing weather protection and thermal regulation. Water-resistant, 2-way front zipper features an internal windflap. Shaped sleeves provide easy-to-move-in comfort. Conforming, fitted style. 3M Scotchlite(TM) reflective transfer detailing increases your visibility to motorists in low light. Closeout.
short_description: The Sugoi Firewall 220 Zip jacket is a sound choice for cold-weather rides.
